content: Personal Medication Coach
Web-based health platform that offers personalized medication management support to individuals with low health literacy.
Medication reminders, medication tracking, access to a consultative pharmacist or nurse, medication education resources, and symptom tracking.
Medisafe, Mango Health, PillPack, MyMeds
One-to-one support from consultative pharmacists or nurses.
Visual Instruction Guide
A guide that uses visuals such as pictures, videos, and diagrams to explain medication instructions and other health information.
Step-by-step medication instruction, customized visual aid creation, language options, medication tracker, and personalized health plan.
Healthy Interactions, Dosecast, Health Literacy Innovations, Visual Health Solutions
Customized visual aid creation based on patient needs.
Medication Audio Guidance
Audio guides that provide medication instructions and information in a clear, concise, and easy-to-understand manner, ideal for individuals with low health literacy.
Voice-activated medication reminders, medication education resources, medication tracker, language options, and side effect management.
Medcoach, Medsimple, MyTherapy, Medisafe, Mango Health
Voice-activated medication reminders and personalized education resources.
Health Advocate Services
Personalized coaching services that help individuals with low health literacy navigate and understand their medication instructions, dosage, and other health information.
Individualized care plan, medication reminder, access to a registered nurse or other medical professionals, medication education resources, and side effect management.
Health Advocate, Quantum Health, Health Assist, PinnacleCare, Accolade
Personalized coaching services and access to registered nurses or other medical professionals for support.
pain_point_description: a lack of understanding of medication instructions or health information can hinder an individual's ability to manage their medications properly. supporting individuals with low health literacy in understanding medication regimens, side effects, or instructions can improve adherence and reduce negative consequences
